mapper.select: select user_email from user where user_email=#{email} and user_name=#{name} and user_tel=#{phone}
mapper.update: update user set user_pw=#{user_pw} where user_email=#{user_email}
mapper.select: select rank() over (order by squat+benchpress+deadlift desc) as ranking, user_email, user_name, (squat+benchpress+deadlift) as big3, squat, benchpress, deadlift from user order by big3 desc, user_name desc
select ranking from rankingView where user_email=#{email};
select user_name from user where user_email=#{email}
mapper.update: update user set user_name=#{user_name}, user_tel=#{user_tel} where user_email=#{user_email}
mapper.select: select user_view.*, username.name as trainer_name from user_view left join username on user_view.trainer=username.email order by user_name
update user set squat=#{squat}, benchpress=#{benchpress}, deadlift=#{deadlift} where user_email=#{user_email}

select user_email, user_name, gender, user_tel, members, (user.squat+user.benchpress+user.deadlift) as big3 from user left join trainer_view on user.user_email=trainer_view.trainer where user.user_type="T" order by user_name
select user_email, user_name, gender, user_tel, (user.squat+user.benchpress+user.deadlift) as big3 from user where user_type="A" order by user_name

select count(*) as total, count(case when user_type="A" then 1 end) as admin, count(case when user_type="T" then 1 end) as trainer, count(case when user_type="U" then 1 end) as user, count(prod_name) as product, count(trainer) as pt from user
mapper.update: update user set user_type=#{user_type} where user_email=#{user_email}
update user set trainer=#{trainer} where user_email=#{user_email}
mapper.select: select user_name, gender, user_tel, user_email, user.prod_name, buy_date, (buy_date+interval period*30 day) as end_date, pt_times, (days-PT_times) as pt_remain, (squat+benchpress+deadlift) as big3, squat, benchpress, deadlift from user left join product on user.prod_name=product.prod_name where trainer=#{email} order by user_name;
